title: Ja Morant's Memory Bank
description:
J&J get dive into the Grizzlies win over the Brooklyn Nets -- KD, Kyrie, and Desmond Bane all went off -- but it was Ja's big night, and his memory of a play vs Ben Simmons from his rookie year that sealed the game. He keeps receipts, people! Plus, Dame Dolla has the Blazers red hot, the 76ers get their first win, and the Patriots have found themselves in the middle of a full-on quarterback controversy. And not the good kind. Is there a good kind? Whatever... Mac Jones kicked a guy in the crotch and we're gonna talk about it. Pull up! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
